subject: Corruption (Institutional)
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: A London High Court judge ruled on Thursday that Bernie Ecclestone, the Formula One boss, had paid a $44-million bribe in connection with the sale of Formula One’s commercial rights in 2005.
snippet: A London High Court judge ruled on Thursday that Bernie Ecclestone, the Formula One boss, had paid a $44-million bribe in connection with the sale of Formula One’s commercial rights in 2005.
